titles.title: Unemployment Protection for Low-Income Families on TANF Act of 2003

A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to toll the 5-year limit for assistance under the temporary assistance to needy families program for recipients who live in a State that is experiencing significant increases in unemployment.
Unemployment Protection for Low-Income Families on TANF Act of 2003
UPLIFT Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Unemployment Protection for Low-Income Families on TANF Act of 2003 (UPLIFT Act of 2003) - Amends part A (Temporary Assistance for Needy Families) (TANF) of title IV of the Social Security Act (SSA) to provide for the disregard of months of assistance received during periods of high unemployment for purposes of the five year limit on assistance under TANF.
